text:
Two persons were killed as two cars in which they were travelling collided near Polur.

Pandiyan (35), a resident of Tiruvannamalai was driving towards Tiruvannamalai and Dinesh (22) of Virugambakkam, Chennai was going towards Chennai via Polur after performing Girivalam on Sunday.

The cars collided near Venmani village near Polur. Dinesh died on the spot.

Pandiyan died on the way to Government Tiruvannamalai Medical College Hospital. Friends who had accompanied Dinesh in the car sustained injuries.
title: 2 killed as cars collide
